overview:
Twice named to Infoweek’s lists of Masters of Technology and Top 250 Innovators, Ted Hoy brings a wealth of experience to AtTask. In his role as CTO, he oversees all Infrastructure, IT Services, Development initiatives and projects. A customer centric leader focused on “giving our customers maximum value that’s easy to use.”

Previously Hoy was Senior Vice President and General Manager of Optum Cloud at Optum, a UnitedHealth Group Company, one of the largest health information, technology and consulting companies in the world. Hoy was formerly Senior Vice President of Products and Technology at Digital River and held numerous senior leadership roles over 10 years with Sun Microsystems where he was awarded the prestigious Sun Chairmanâ€™s Leadership Award. He also held senior leadership positions at Sony Electronics and USWest.

If Hoy isn’t at the office, he’s proudly fulfilling his duties as a dad by putting high- heeled shoes on a Barbie or reading monosyllabic literature out loud, getting in a round of golf or spending the day on a board (wake, snow, or surf).

Hoy is a CU-Boulder Buffalo where he received his MBA and did his undergraduate work and the University of California, Stanislaus.
